title: How to Make Snow Cream (Real Cream Version)

steps.headline: Heat the cream.
steps.description: When ready to boil, stir into it quickly the cornstarch, blended with some cold cream.

steps.headline: Sweeten to taste and allow it to boil gently, stirring for two or three minutes.
Do not allow the mixture to boil up more than once after adding the eggs.
Flavor with lemon, vanilla, bitter almond or grated lemon peel.
Lay the snow thus formed quickly in rocky heaps on silver or glass dishes, or in shapes.

text: Heat the cream. When ready to boil, stir into it quickly the cornstarch, blended with some cold cream. Sweeten to taste and allow it to boil gently, stirring for two or three minutes.  Add the egg whites quickly.  Do not allow the mixture to boil up more than once after adding the eggs.  Flavor with lemon, vanilla, bitter almond or grated lemon peel.  Lay the snow thus formed quickly in rocky heaps on silver or glass dishes, or in shapes.
